titles.title: Recognizing and honoring the 51 mobility Airmen from Joint Base Charleston who received the Distinguished Service Cross.
Recognizing and honoring the 51 mobility Airmen from Joint Base Charleston who received the Distinguished Service Cross.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes and honors the 51 mobility Airmen from Joint Base Charleston who received the Distinguished Service Cross for heroic efforts during Operation Allies Refuge (the evacuation from Afghanistan).
